title: Elements - Sacred Geometry Foundations
author: Euclid of Alexandria
abstract: The foundational text of geometry that establishes the mathematical principles underlying sacred architecture and cosmic harmony.

title: The Hermetic Corpus
author: Hermes Trismegistus
abstract: The collected wisdom of Hermes Trismegistus, containing the principles of alchemical transformation and spiritual evolution.

title: The Zohar - Book of Splendor
author: Rabbi Shimon bar Yochai
abstract: The foundational text of Kabbalah, revealing the mystical interpretation of the Torah and the structure of divine emanations.

title: Tarot de Marseille - Historical Origins
author: Unknown
abstract: The original Tarot de Marseille deck that established the 78-card system and archetypal imagery used in modern tarot.

title: The Archetypes and the Collective Unconscious
author: Carl Gustav Jung
abstract: Jung's seminal work on the universal patterns of the human psyche and their manifestation in dreams, art, and culture.

title: The Flower of Life - Sacred Geometry in Ancient Cultures
author: Drunvalo Melchizedek
abstract: Comprehensive study of the Flower of Life pattern found in ancient cultures worldwide and its implications for consciousness.

title: Mutus Liber - The Silent Book of Alchemy
author: Unknown
abstract: The wordless book of alchemy containing 15 symbolic plates that illustrate the alchemical process without text.

title: The Matrix and Philosophy
author: William Irwin
abstract: Philosophical analysis of The Matrix film trilogy exploring concepts of reality, consciousness, and digital existence.

title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland - Psychedelic Interpretation
author: Lewis Carroll
abstract: The classic tale of Alice's journey through Wonderland, interpreted through the lens of psychedelic experience and dream logic.

title: American Gods
author: Neil Gaiman
abstract: Modern mythological tale exploring the clash between old gods and new American deities in contemporary society.

title: The World of the Witcher - Monster Ecology
author: CD Projekt RED
abstract: Comprehensive guide to the monsters, creatures, and ecology of The Witcher's fantasy world.

title: The Red Book (Liber Novus)
author: Carl Gustav Jung
abstract: Jung's personal mythological journey through active imagination, containing mandalas and visionary experiences.

title: Solfeggio Frequencies and Sound Healing
author: Dr. Joseph Puleo
abstract: Research on the healing properties of ancient Solfeggio frequencies and their application in vibrational medicine.

title: The 72 Names of God (Shemhamephorash)
author: Unknown
abstract: The 72 sacred names of God derived from Exodus, each associated with specific angelic powers and attributes.

title: The Lesser Key of Solomon - Ars Goetia
author: Unknown
abstract: The famous grimoire detailing the 72 demons of the Goetia and methods for their summoning and control.

title: The Golden Ratio in Sacred Architecture
author: Various
abstract: Academic study of the golden ratio's application in sacred architecture throughout history.

title: The Chakra System - Ancient Origins and Modern Applications
author: Dr. Hiroshi Motoyama
abstract: Scientific and historical study of the chakra system and its applications in healing and consciousness development.

title: Merkaba Mysticism in Ancient Egypt
author: Drunvalo Melchizedek
abstract: Study of the Merkaba tradition in ancient Egyptian mysticism and its modern revival.

title: Quantum Consciousness - The Bridge Between Science and Spirit
author: Dr. Amit Goswami
abstract: Exploration of quantum physics principles applied to understanding consciousness and spiritual phenomena.

title: The Rosarium Philosophorum - Alchemical Wedding
author: Unknown
abstract: The famous alchemical text illustrating the sacred marriage of opposites in the alchemical process.
